name: Minotaur (itch) (culture, skcotterell)
description:
A tilt-ball labyrinth game, like the one you played as a kid. 

Think you can you escape? 

Game by Colter Wehmeier (@abstitial)

Music by Ian Cummins

Graphic Design/Identity by Scott Cotterell (@skcotterell)

Prototype built for Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1 (2020)
